title: [信息]EpicRename——重命名物品和重编辑[1.8-1.15.2]
author: 冰星
txt_content:
本帖最后由 冰星 于 2020-4-2 20:16 编辑 
EPICRENAME
下载地址
简介功能:
重命名物品给物品添加lore使物品发光支持颜色和格式
命令:
/rename <名称>/lore <第一行|第二行|第三行>
/setloreline <行数 > <文本>/setloreline <行数 > <文本>/removeloreline <行数 > /glow/removeglow/ecpiname <help,license,reload,debug>/export <hand,inventory>/import <hand,inventory> <网址>
需求:
spigot/bukkit 1.13(旧版本去历史版本页面下载)Java7+Vault1.5.x(可选经济插件)

 图片
免责声明DISCLAIMERS 
* THIS PLUGIN USES A METRICS SYSTEM MADE ay HENNA, WHICH MEANS SOME INFORMATION WILL BE SENT TO MCSTATS ORG AND SHOWN TO THE PUBLIC. THIS DATA INCLUDES INFORMATION SUCH AS THE PLUBIN'S VERSION, SERVER VERSIONS OS SYSTEMS JAVA VERSION. ETC. ALL DATA IS SENT TO MOATS. ORG FOR ANALYSI' EITHER DY THE PUBLIC OR PLUGIN AUTHOR. NO PERSONAL DATA 15 TAKEN FROM THE SERVER AND IF YOU WANT TO OPT-OUT OF MCSTATS. GO TO YOUR PLUGINS FOLDER, THEN GO TO THE TLUGINMETRIC5" FOLDER [THIS FOLDER IS AUTOMATICALLY CREATED) AND THEN SET "OPT-OUT" TO TRUE. MORE INFO CAN BE FOUND ON MCSTATS. ORG. THIS PLUGIN ALSO SENDS SIMILAR DATA TO ETATS. ORE 
* VERSIONS BELOW 1.13 MAY OR MAY NOT WORK. BUT WILL NOT BE OFFICIALLY SUPPORTED. * THIS PLUGIN WILLMESSAGE ME IF I JOIN YOUR SERVER AND TELL ME THAT YOU USE EPICRENAME.

权限命令 EpicRename
基本权限：epicrename.epicrename
/epicrename reload：epicrename.epicrename.reload
/epicrename debug：epicrename.epicrename.debug

命令 Rename
基本权限：epicrename.rename
每个材料权限：epicrename.rename.material.MATERIAL_HERE
所有材料的权限：epicrename.rename.material.*
格式化代码权限：epicrename.rename.format.CODE
所有格式代码的权限：epicrename.rename.format.*

命令 Lore
基本权限：epicrename.lore
每个材料权限：epicrename.lore.material.MATERIAL_HERE
所有材料的权限：epicrename.lore.material.*
格式化代码权限：epicrename.lore.format.CODE
所有格式代码的权限：epicrename.lore.format.*

命令 SetLoreLine
基本权限：epicrename.setloreline
每个材料权限：epicrename.setloreline.material.MATERIAL_HERE
所有材料的权限：epicrename.setloreline.material.*
格式化代码权限：epicrename.setloreline.format.CODE
所有格式代码的权限：epicrename.setloreline.format.*

命令 RemoveLoreLine
基本权限：epicrename.removeloreline
每项材料权限：epicrename.removeloreline.material.MATERIAL_HERE
所有材料的权限：epicrename.removeloreline.material.*

命令 Glow
基本权限：epicrename.glow
每项材料许可：epicrename.glow.material.MATERIAL_HERE
所有材料的权限：epicrename.glow.material.*

命令 Removeglow
基本权限：epicrename.removeglow
每项材料权限：epicrename.removeglow.material.MATERIAL_HERE
所有材料的权限：epicrename.removeglow.material.*

命令 Import
基本权限： epicrename.import

命令 Export
基本许可： epicrename.export

字符限制
绕过权限： epicrename.bypass.charlimit

绕过黑名单
绕过物品黑名单权限：epicrename.bypass.materialblacklist
绕过文本黑名单权限：epicrename.bypass.textblacklist
绕过现有名称黑名单权限：epicrename.bypass.existingname
绕过现有知识黑名单权限：epicrename.bypass.existinglore

绕过命令成本
/ rename：epicrename.bypass.costs.rename
/ lore：epicrename.bypass.costs.lore
/ glow：epicreaname.bypass.costs.glow
所有命令：epicrename.bypass.costs.*

绕过格式化代码限制
绕过最大限制：epicrename.bypass.formattingcodemax
绕过最小限制：epicrename.bypass.formattingcodemin

代码
后续[groupid=1511]Server CT[/groupid]
